overview_of_class:
This is the second quarter of the Elementary German sequence: a systematic introduction to basic German. All four language skills? speaking, listening comprehension, reading, and writing?- will be stressed to insure that students acquire a basic command of German. Classes are conducted in German, except when explanations of grammar or other material require the use of English.
Some key features of this quarter: 1) Writing assignments, 2) Mystery Guest interview, 3) Selected readings by Goethe and Heine.
name: Beginning German
subject: GERMAN
